H0.text: what is the capital city of spain wiki answers. Barcelona

H1.text: what is the capital city of spain wiki answers. Seville

H2.text: what is the capital city of spain wiki answers. Valencia

H3.text: what is the capital city of spain wiki answers. Madrid

A4.text: Madrid is the capital and most populous city of Spain.

A5.text: The Spanish Constitution of 1931 was the first to legislate the location of the country's capital, setting it explicitly in Madrid.
